name: Buonanotte Valentina - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Designed by No√© Duchaufour-Lawrance in 2008 for Ceccotti Collezioni, Buonanotte Valentina is a wood constructed bed, becoming a design icon synonymous with harmonious beauty. It features a base in veneered plywood and frame in solid American walnut. The headboard, characterized by parallel horizontal lines enclosed in a wooden frame, adds a distinctive appearance. It is available in versions with high or low headboards, with options for leather padding, reflecting modern design aesthetics.
